ScriptExecuteDTO Data Type

Used for running scripts for debugging purposes. Contains context for the script to execute against and the script itself.

Properties
name data type description
script_text string The script to execute
script_language string The script language (Currently there is only support for "python")
object_type_id ObjectHandle The type id of the object's type
object_id number The internal id of the object to which this script applies to (e.g. incident, task, Data Table row, etc.)
object_parent_type_id ObjectHandle For Notes and Attachments objects, the object's parent type id: incident (0), or task (1)

Example

{
  "script_text" : "...",
  "script_language" : "...",
  "object_type_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "object_id" : 12345,
  "object_parent_type_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  }
}
